message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exceptional opportunity to acquire a remarkable product that I believe would significantly enhance your endeavors. Given its intrinsic value and potential impact on your business, I am confident it would be a wise investment for you. After careful consideration, I propose a purchase price of $950000 for the product. This offer aims to reflect the product's true worth while allowing us to reach a mutually beneficial agreement. I look forward to discussing this further with you.
